sentences.sentence: Are you ready to confess your sinfulness before your loving God so that He can forgive and purify your life?
sentences.translation: 你准备好在仁慈的主前坦诚你的罪恶所以他能够原谅你的罪恶，净化你的生命吗？

sentences.sentence: "There goes a woman," resumed Roger Chillingworth, after a pause, "who, be her demerits what they may, hath none of that mystery of hidden sinfulness which you deem so grievous to be borne."
sentences.translation: “那边走着一个妇人，”罗杰·齐灵渥斯停了一会儿后接着说，“她不论有什么过错，绝不会被你认为如此难以忍受的隐蔽着的负罪感所左右。”

sentences.sentence: The archbishop explained, “The Divine Mercy devotion is a reminder for us in the modern world to be mindful that God’s mercy is always there and stronger than our sinfulness or our limitations.”
sentences.translation: 总主教解释：「救主慈悲提醒生活在这个世代的我们，要记起天主的慈爱常存，比我们的罪恶和局限更强有力。」 他又说：「我们为遇难者举行祈祷会。
